me.bhop.bjdautilities.command

Class CommandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • me.bhop.bjdautilities.command.CommandHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuildDependentCommandHandler, GuildIndependentCommandHandler

    public abstract class CommandHandler
extends net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    The base for both the GuildDependentCommandHandler and GuildIndependentCommandHandler.
